document_data.mainbody:
Lorlynn Zmirth was a drow mage in Undermountain in the early 1490s DR.
Around the Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR, Lorlynn and her twin brother Elvilac Zmirth went into Undermontain hoping to collect powerful spellbooks. While searching separately inside the Obstacle Course level, however, the Netherskull killed Elvilac. Lorlynn was unaware of this and still awaited the return of her brother. If she learned about the death of Elvilac, she would try to recover his body and reanimate him as an undead.
Lorlynn hated all people apart from her brother.
